choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews

### Response:


Sure! Here's a sample meal plan for you for the next week:

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with fresh berries and honey (dairy-free milk)
Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with steamed vegetables (without garlic, honey or almonds)
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and green beans (pistachios and cashews can be added as a garnish)

Day 2:
Breakfast: Tofu scramble with spinach and tomatoes (dairy-free yogurt)
Lunch: Quinoa salad with cherry tomatoes, avocado and lemon vinaigrette (almonds and almond butter can be added as a topping)
Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with steamed vegetables (without garlic or honey)

Day 3:
Breakfast: Avocado toast with smoked salmon (dairy-free milk)
Lunch: Hummus wrap with carrot sticks and cucumber slices (pistachios can be added as a topping)
Dinner: Baked sweet potato fries with buffalo chicken dip (without garlic or honey)

Day 4:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and tomatoes (dairy-free yogurt)
Lunch: Grilled vegetable stir-fry with brown rice (without almonds, almond butter or cashews)
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus (without garlic or honey)

Day 5:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries and granola (dairy-free milk)
Lunch: Grilled chicken Caesar salad with croutons (without garlic, honey or almonds)
Dinner: Baked sweet potato lasagna with spinach and mushrooms (pistachios can be added as a topping)

Day 6:
Breakfast: Avocado toast with smoked salmon (dairy-free milk)
Lunch: Hummus wrap with carrot sticks and cucumber slices (without garlic or honey)
Dinner: Baked shrimp skewers with steamed vegetables (without almonds, almond butter or cashews)

Day 7:
Breakfast: Overnight oats with fresh berries and nuts (dairy-free milk)
Lunch: Grilled vegetable salad with balsamic vinaigrette (without garlic or honey)
Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted asparagus (without almonds, almond butter or cashews)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
